name: Straw Doll [Thanksgiving]
skill: Restores 2417/3077 HP and receives 39%/50% less DMG for a limited time. (MAX)

additional_data.description: The spirit of a doll made from straw in the shape of a person. Despite common belief, she's not a tool for applying curses. She actually takes on people's sins and delivers them to heaven. She has a strong sense of self-sacrifice, fully prepared to give her own life in the service of others. Some people make fun of the way she goes diving headfirst into all sorts of trouble, but she doesn't mean any harm by it. On the contrary, she does it all out of compassion. However, many at the Bureau have been warned not to ask too much of her—she might just do it.

skill: "I shall bear the burden... of the entire world."
limit_break: "How long has it been since I was this happy?"
